main event: A ground-visual observation of a ball of white light changing colors in Naha, Okinawa on August 3, 1959.
interesting points: The object changed color from bright white to pale green., The object initially appeared in bright light before disappearing behind clouds., The observation lasted for approximately 5 minutes., Observers included pilots and control tower operators from Naha AB., The weather conditions included scattered clouds and thunderstorms in the east.
witness description: Pilots and control tower operators from Naha AB
